name: Margherita Pizza
description: Delicious pizza topped with tomato, mozzarella, and basil leaves.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Fresh salad with grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty topped with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onion in a sesame seed bun.

name: Sushi Platter
description: Assorted sushi rolls with fresh fish, rice, and vegetables.

name: Pad Thai
description: Traditional Thai stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, peanuts, and bean sprouts.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy risotto cooked with Arborio rice, mushrooms, garlic, and parmesan cheese.
